text: Aaron Carter (December 7, 1987-November 5, 2022) was an American pop singer. He was born in Tampa, Florida. He became famous in the late 1990s. ==Career== Carter started his music career when he was seven years old as the singer of Dead End. He left the band after two years. Carter performed for the first time on his own in Berlin in March 1997 as the opening act for Backstreet Boys. He was 9 years old. After this he was signed to Edel America. His first album Aaron Carter was released in December 1997 in Europe. It was released in the United States on June 16, 1998. Carter acted in the 2004 movie Fat Albert and Popstar in 2005 with the soundtrack "Saturday Night". Carter had an older brother, Nick, and three sisters, Angel (twin sister), B.J. and Leslie. On November 5, 2022, Carter died at home at the age of 34. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0004809/ IMDB Category:1987 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American child singers Category:American pop singers Category:Singers from Tampa, Florida
title: Aaron Carter
